mapper.select: select * from final.order where user_no=#{value} order by order_no desc

SELECT SUM(order_amount * order_price) AS monthly_sum FROM final.order WHERE YEAR(order_date) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) AND MONTH(order_date) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE) GROUP BY YEAR(order_date), MONTH(order_date)

SELECT DAYNAME(order_date) AS dayName, SUM(order_price * order_amount) AS sale_count FROM final.order WHERE order_date >= DATE_SUB(DATE(NOW()), INTERVAL WEEKDAY(NOW()) DAY) GROUP BY DAYNAME(order_date)

SELECT o.order_set, o.order_date, u.user_name, SUM(o.order_amount * o.order_price) AS total_order_price FROM final.order AS o JOIN user AS u ON o.user_no = u.user_no GROUP BY o.order_set, u.user_name ORDER BY o.order_date desc

SELECT (SELECT SUM(order_amount * order_price) FROM final.order WHERE order_date >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW() ,'%Y-%m-01') AND order_date < DATE_FORMAT(NOW() + INTERVAL 1 MONTH, '%Y-%m-01')) / 3000000 * 100 AS percentage_of_monthly_target
